biotools.summary: Facilitates the annotation of newly sequenced proteins by helping users assess the coherence of protein groups found in various databases. It is based on a non-redundant dataset of over 6.6 million protein sequences mapped to 240,000 protein groups. Queries may be made using sequence identifiers, gene symbols, protein functions or amino acid sequences.

bioschemas.name: ProGMap
